title: Brovvne his fiftie yeares practice. Or An exact discourse concerning snafflle-riding [sic], for trotting and ambling of all manner of horses whatsoeuer, from one degree to another, till they be perfit both for the trot and amble A subiect, neuer as yet pubished [sic] by any heretofore. By William Brovvne Gent.
author: Browne, William, Gent, fl. 1624.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, and are to be sold by Iohn Piper,
